title: NASA’s Planetary Defenders Documentary Premieres April 16
summary: NASA is bringing the world of planetary defense to the public with its new documentary, “Planetary Defenders.” What would humanity do if an asteroid were headed for Earth? The documentary takes viewers inside the real-life efforts of scientists and engineers working to detect, track, and mitigate potential asteroid threats. title: Live coverage: ULA to launch 27 Amazon Project Kuiper satellites on Atlas 5 rocket from Cape Canaveral
summary: The mission will be the first deployment of full production Kuiper satellites into low Earth orbit. Liftoff from pad 41 at Cape Canaveral Space Force Station is targeted for a two-hour window that opens at 7 p.m. EDT (2300 UTC).
